full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 204 of 262 1915 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross 1 bullet point list on that page, there is a paragraph -- where I want you to focus is the last few sentences, but you can read the full paragraph. Let me know when you've read it. 4 A. Yes, that's correct, I did say that. But at that time, I hadn't done a lot of research in my logbook. 6 Q. Exactly. So, at that time, you were responding from your memory? 8 A. Correct. 9 Q. As best you could about when you recalled first meeting Jane; correct? 11 A. Correct. 12 Q. And you told the government that you best recalled first meeting Jane around the year 2000, give or take a year or two; right? 15 A. Yes. I was a couple of years off. 16 Q. Well, that was before you were shown the flight logs; right? You gave that response before you were shown the flight logs; right? 19 A. Yes. 20 Q. And as we saw, the flight logs for the flights in '96, '97, and '98 where there is an indication where someone with Jane's first name appears in the passenger list, those flight logs just show just that, someone with Jane's first name flying on those flights; right? 25 A. Correct. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019066
